mapper.select:
SELECT b.goods_id AS `id`, b.website AS `website`, a.pic_url AS `imgsrc`, a.price_string AS `piprice`, a.title AS `title`, CONCAT(a.parent_market_name, a.market) AS `marketname`, b.goods_collect_id AS `goodsCollectId`
ORDER BY b.goods_collect_id DESC LIMIT #{start}, ${size}
mapper.sql: FROM shigu_goods_tiny_${webSite} a, shigu_goods_collect b WHERE b.goods_id=a.goods_id AND b.website=#{webSite} AND b.user_id=#{userId}
